name: After School
description: After School program operated by Real Options for City Kids. Kids in the program are exposed to a mixture of learning enrichment, sports and fitness, academic support. These programs help our kids feel like they’re part of the R.O.C.K. family, as they form lasting relationships with role models and other participants throughout their day. (ROCK) 2:05-6:00 MTTHF, 12:50-6:00 W

howToGetIt: To apply for after school program use Online TOOL
cost: This is a fee based service, sliding scale is available with proof of income requirements.
